website_summaries.verdict: Good for small to large rooms, this option features multistage filtering and an independently-controlled negative ion generator.
pros: Filter stages include a pre-filter, true HEPA filter, a cold analyst, and an activated carbon fiber filter
Features an independently-controlled negative ion generator, as well as auto on/off timers
Works well in a variety of room sizes
cons: Some buyers report problems finding replacement filters for this purifier
This option can run a little loud

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I received this air purifier about 6 weeks ago. St the time, I was affected by the air in my almost 100 year old Home, coughing quite a bit in certain rooms. We run it 24 hours a day and have noticed not only am I not coughing but the air in the room smells so much better (old animal smells), so much so, I’ve ordered a Second one to put in the other end of the house.
customer_reviews.author: jackie watson

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier but check for filter replacements before buying
customer_reviews.text: Provides a nice background noise when running at night and my wife's allergies don't bother her nearly as much as they used to before buying this. Still waiting for replacement air filters to become available but with getting nearly a year out of one filter I am in no rush. The manufacturer claims they will be available again soon but check before you buy
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jagos

customer_reviews.title: COLLECTS DIRT/DUST.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my first Amazon reviews ever and I felt like this product really needed it. As someone who was very skeptical on air filters and how much they actually help this device as helped me sleep has made me feel much better throughout the day and has legitimately changed my life. I recently went to replace the air filter and to see just how much dust it's taken is insane for such a tiny device the amount of dust it must've captured and such is great I'm so happy with it and am very satisfied for the price. Might even purchase another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product to others
customer_reviews.text: This seems to take care of the cigarette smoke/smell quickly by the lone smoker in the house. I put it on sleep when we leave the house and am able to come back to a clean smelling home. Would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mplsnurse

customer_reviews.title: 3rd purchase
customer_reviews.text: This time I bought two more units for another house. We have lots of smoke in Southern Oregon. Leaving one unit in each room we use a lot takes care of the problem. Sometimes we move a unit from an office to the living room. I have recommended pro breeze to several friends. Most of the time we run ours at the middle speed. As mentioned before, we monitor conditions with a tem top 600 meter, so we really know what is happening.
customer_reviews.author: John Ames

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quietest machine out there and it also works as a night light haha. Slender machine, quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a great air purifier that is quiet this is a great ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great air purifier that is quiet this is a great one... doesn't take up a lot of space either. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderOne

customer_reviews.title: better off buying replacement or furnace filter and tape it to a fan!
customer_reviews.text: It only has ONE very thin filter that may have layers, but it is so thin it would actually laughable except for true fact I paid money for it. This is for a room the size of a large closet it is NOT even for a medium size room, may be a 200 foot room. Very disappointed. Go to hone depot and buy any heppa replacement filter or furnace filter, tape it to a room fan and you have the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Z

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of use, filters air, no issues
customer_reviews.text: This works as described. I have been using one for around six months now and just bought two more. I like the price point and the price of the refill filters. After cleaning and switching out filters, I can see it is clearly working. I also breathe better at night while sleeping. I have really bad allergies to indoor air pollutants.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice and modern looking!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a unit that not only would be affordable, but it needed to be quiet and nice looking. Both of these features were fulfilled with the Pro-Breeze 5 in 1 air purifier. It is easy to run and is extremely quiet. It fits in well as it is modern looking and not big and bulky for a unit that can handle 400+square feet. Highly recommend this unit. Jim
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the sq feet this thing covers it’s definitely worth it! Our last air purifier went out on us after 10 years! Did some comparing and found this one with great reviews and thought I’d try it out! I love how quiet it is! My kids are louder than it, haha. I can feel a difference in the air after having it on for 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Complain about probreeze arrived today.
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with item . Arrived today and i conct it It was working well. But Suddenly I heard the sound of an explosion. I knew it had a problem and it was not working and there were no lights on top of control panel. I need you to find solution for your item . If there is shop to fixed and related services to Amazon. My phone no 00966561330728 My name is adil bayary . Item is proBreeze .
customer_reviews.author: adil bayary

customer_reviews.title: Big and bright
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Some people may like that but I think it takes up too much real estate. It is easy to put together but the noise levels are way off. Settings 1 and 2 are pretty soft and then the jump from 2 - 3 is very significant. Too much in my opinion. I like to have an air purifier in my kids' rooms because they also make great sound machines but the buttons on this one were too bright. It's a decent machine. Just not for us
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF PRO BREEZE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. YOU CAN'T GET REPLACEMENT FILTERS BUT THEY WILL CONTINUEBTO SELL IT AND TAKE YOUR MONEY KNOWING THIS. I HAVE CONTACTED BOTH PRO BREEZE AND AMAZON, AND NEITHER COULD CARE LESS.
customer_reviews.author: Linette Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purifier - Covers Over 500sqft
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research prior to getting this purifier. I have a bout of asthma I had as a child. I moved to a apartment with new carpeting and suspect previous renter had a siamese cat. I love this purifier and after a few days notice a difference in air quality. Order a replacement filter too just in case when you need it you will have it. Several units show filters out of stock. Also included info doesnt mention you have to remove clear wrap around inside filter before use. This purifer is very quiet, works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: PamB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Clean Air
customer_reviews.text: Still working great and it's been almost 2 years. We live in a new subdivision and there is a lot of dust in the air from the construction. It's so easy to clean and really captures a lot of particles. I also really like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Evanoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! I was drawn to the price and positive reviews and this unit was exactly as advertised. I use this in a small house >800 sq ft and located close to almond.orchards and plenty.of dust. It works fantastic. O initial use i noticed a difference in breathing in less.than 30 minutes!!!! A 5k hour [$29] filter is attractive as well!!! Buy it enjoy the clean air.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best air purifier that I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air purifier. It is the first one I have purchased that actually cleans odors out of the air. It also cleans the air so I can breathe. I have terrible allergies and this one finally has helped me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to get a new filter this is my dilemma.
customer_reviews.author: kMs

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love this! We bought two. One for the bedroom and one for our huge bedroom. We have had such a dust problem and allergies have become a major issue. Now that we have this, I see almost no dust in the air or on furniture surfaces, even all the way across the room. This device says it’s good for a little over 500sqft. Our living room is a little over 600sqft. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Works silent and you notice after 24 hours the air difference.
customer_reviews.text: Its working as described with no issues. Happy to notice that the day after start using it I've not sneezed at all. Working onboard the ship the air con is not the best when comes about dust. Looking fwd to buy the additional filter when become available.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Codrin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from bad allergies and this has helped immensely. It is small enough that it doesn't get in the way, but big enough to cover a huge area. Very quiet, even on high u barely hear it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Looks/sounds good. Not sure if I’m using it correctly due to minimal instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really tell how good it’s working. It’s super quiet and very lightweight. Looks sleek. My only gripe is that the manual (if you want to call it that) is super basic and doesn’t explain much of anything. Not really sure what does what and why. Seems like I can only run this in max four hour increments at any speed other than sleep mode which runs at lowest with no lights? My thoughts are that I’d like to run it at high at all times...but I don’t even know if it needs to. Wish there was more description of the different modes.
customer_reviews.author: lauren tarmey

customer_reviews.title: WHERE ARE THE IONS???
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday. Love the look and the simplicity to use it. However I have yet to smell the fresh smell of IONS in the air which it why I bought this. Reached out to Amazon and they were unable to reach the company for support. Hopefully I am able to get some support to see if I am missing something. If not, I will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: RONALD C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with impeccable Cstmr Srvc
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's quiet and it helps eliminate the smoke out of a room. The one major downfall is, that because of the covid crap, replacment filters are NOT available. The Pro Breeze home company cannot give an eta on filter avalibility. :( Update: I did, once again, reach put to Probreeze, whom, with great customer service, gave me the Amazon link, to purchase. This purifier is worth the price and if you think about it; think about the frivolous things you spend your money on and you'll just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Outspoken

customer_reviews.title: No Replacement Filter Available. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased October 2019 and the sleep mode light has been flashing for a month because I need a new filter but there are no replacement filters available anywhere. There are no alternative filters available so this product is useless. I would like my money back. Will never purchase an obscure brand again. The product did work wonders but is useless without the filter. My allergies are back and it's awful.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting a replacement  filter!
customer_reviews.text: Worthless if you can’t get a replacement filter when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tboss317

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a built-in reminder when a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and stylish look. Quiet! I like that it has a built-in reminder when a new filter is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley S

customer_reviews.title: Good Filter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit. I bought a different style of air cleaner for my mom 4 years ago. One of the tall thin ones. It seems to help but the filter on it is nothing like the one on this unit. I bought a replacement filter at the same time I bought the unit and the filter is expensive but I'm glad I didn't get the tall thin one for my bedroom. My wife says it isn't loud (I can't hear) and it is definitely moving air.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get filters
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this item it worked great at removing everything the filter does not last as long as they say and ......unfortunately, I’m pretty sure they just stopped making it and the filters that go along with it. The filters have been out of stock since February 2020 before all the COVID craziness started. It is now just just a stupid box that sits in the corner, while I keep hoping they will make more of the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I just found out I am allergic to cats, it has really helped with my allergies. I use it in my bedroom and it keeps the air nice and clean. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Candaisy

customer_reviews.title: Can't Find a Replacement FIlter
customer_reviews.text: I think this works great, however I have yet to find a place that has a replacement filter in stock. Even the Pro Breeze website does not have any in stock and I see no ETA for when they will. So after 6 months, this doesn't really do much to purify or filter the air. I would not buy this unless the filter situation gets sorted.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Harding

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing, plug and play, no maintenance needed for a year.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet which means a lot to me, I hate fan noise. I have two other 500 sq. ft. air purifiers that are louder at lowest setting. Biggest thing compared to other ones is that Filters don't need replacing until a whole year. Other models of same size need filters every 6 to 8 months. I just don't like to be bothered liked that, so this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Quality control on filters/system need to improve
customer_reviews.text: I placed this unit in my study room. On Day 1~3, the air purifier generated a pretty strong "smell" in the room, and then from Day 4~6, the smell has subsided a bit but it still trapped inside the room as long as the unit is on. On Day 7 morning, i removed the unit out from the study room, the smell was gone by the evening. I'll contact the seller for advise on this matter. Furthermore, the fan speed at 2nd level generated pretty loud noise in a quiet room.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is sleek looking & a great price range. I could not wait for this item to come as I own another brand that still works but I wanted to try & upgrade. Just got it 24 hrs ago and it has become ONE of my best friends to help me & my dogs, as it is quiet, clean and so far, does the job without any negative feedback. Love it & Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: EZa

customer_reviews.title: Will not stand alone on carpet.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, but the design is a fail. It cannot stand alone on carpet. Not everyone has all wood floors. The teeter, topple over factor is very high on carpeting. I have to prop up this $100 dollar machine or down it goes. I would look elsewhere if you have carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rowden

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price with a low maintenance cost.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it not only filters the air but also has an ionizer which is a very important feature to me. Most other air purifiers I looked at did not have the ionizing feature and the replacement filters were too expensive. The replacement filters for the Pro Breeze are reasonably priced which was a major factor in my decision to purchase along with the cost of the unit. The only con is it's a little loud on high fan but tolerable. The Pro Beeze has significantly improved the air quality in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Catches a lot of dust
customer_reviews.text: I live near an industrial area, and the HVAC system filters don't seem to do much, so the apartment easily gets quite dusty. This purifier picks up dust like nobody's business and its output air definitely feels cleaner than the air outside. Only qualm is that it's very hard to find a filter! The company told me that they've been out of stock for months due to covid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier is wonderful. It does just as much or more than the higher priced purifiers. Pro Breeze contacted me by email right after my purchase plus after I got the product to check with me to see how I like it. Not many companies do that. I am planning on buying another one for our living room. This one is in our bedroom and what a difference in the air and the way we sleep. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat's Kup Creations, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and silent.
customer_reviews.text: Saved my life. I was coming home sick everyday for 3 months. Until I was convinced to purchase this filter and put It In my office. Haven't had a problem since. Is also silent.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I have 2 in my home . I was worried about electric bill getting out of hand but can barely notice increase. Never used sleep mode so cant comment. I have 1 in bedroom that runs 24/7 on medium setting...not loud at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very old building. My apartment's bathroom has some funk I can't figure out... anyway, after having some plumbing replaced, the smell is still there. Also, my neighbors are smokers. Between these two things, I NEEDED an air purifier, and I'm 100% satisfied with this one to rid the air of everything I can't stand smelling in this place!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Chwan

customer_reviews.title: Filters the air
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with a air quality tester. After I burned some sugar over the holidays, the air quality tester ticked up to over 300! I turned on the air purifier and it took about an hour to get the air quality tester down to 3. Our house generally tests at 16 so the purifier got it down to better than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Attractively silent
customer_reviews.text: I have an excitable Shelty and a cat that was renamed "Rocket" because of her speed of disappearance and reappearance, I was very leery of whether they would accept any air purifier intruding on their space. When they determined it would not blow air on them (goes straight up unlike the other three room air purifiers that I own), they treated it just another piece of silent furniture. They now both nap on a rug two feet away from it. Perhaps it is a little cooler because of the airflow. They are both rather shaggy from the coronavirus lockdown and their inability to see the groomer.
customer_reviews.author: John A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy two! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this air purifier. I would like one for every room of my house! This one works so well, it’s a little scary. I would highly recommend this. Easy to use, easy to clean. 3 levels, with a sleep timer and ion filter. The filter is also easy to clean and replace. I looked at more expensive options, but kept coming back to this one and I’m glad I did and will be getting a second!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great purifier.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting started but the first one I ordered did not work. The company replaced it within a week. The new one is quiet and seems efficient. I can easily sleep on the middle setting and I can tell a difference with the negative ions on. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars it the cost of the filters. They are a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: JmanTaylor

customer_reviews.title: I plan on buying 2 more
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it for two, maybe three months and it seems like it’s doing the job. Definitely a difference with two dogs and two cats - a lot less dust and dander, for sure. Vacuuming the filter definitely helps prolong the use.
customer_reviews.author: Raven.RaeN

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it says it will do. Only causes more dust.  Want money back.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell one single difference despite being placed in a room just a tad bit smaller that the recommended size. The ion feature is non-existent. Light comes on but having had a Breeze Air ion unit that I could most definitely tell (smell) this unit has zero evidence of any ion emittence. The dust in my house has increased. Before the unit I rarely needed to dust. Now the dust settles same day. Sound of fan on high not a problem. I want to return but no longer have my box.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Addict

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and it did the trick! We have African Grey birds and my daughter became allergic to them. She had pneumonia twice and after having the air purifier in the room with the birds, she is getting better. Thank you for your help.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Overing

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small places!
customer_reviews.text: I got my purifier about a month ago, and I love it! I live in an older apartment and between the old carpet and the smoke smell that comes from the neighbor, this thing has helped eliminate it! I will keep it in the living room for a couple day, then move it to each bedroom and then cycle back again, the sleep mode is nice and quiet. It’s slim so it can go in the rooms and not take much space up at all which is great because our Rooms are tiny! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great investment guy's
customer_reviews.text: I've not had this unit very long but so far so good I think it maybe working guy's no more funny orders off this old house so yeah something has changed since I got this thing 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawg !

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and works for Cig smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed, pretty to look at. But even better, it actually works! My neighbor in my building across the hall from me smokes and every time he opens his door, I get a wave of smelly smoke near my front door. Now, I put the air purifier near my entrance and the smoke smell no longer fills my apartment! life saver
customer_reviews.author: Mike Price

customer_reviews.title: Pets
customer_reviews.text: Works good easy set up. Its quiet on the lower speeds but you can hear it pretty well when it's turned up. It doesn't bother me I keep it around midlevel speed. And its not too bad. Works well with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Waits

customer_reviews.title: Pro breeze on full + down comforter + 68° = coma-like sleep.
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the crispness of the air enter your nose at night. Imagine sleeping with a fan on that that makes noise and actually changes the feeling of the air reaching the deepest nasal cavities in your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Great filter and purifier.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help keep house freah I leave it running 24/7. You cant find the replacement filters on Amazon, but they are available on the manufacturer website even if they are pricey. I will say I can't tell much of a difference in the amount of dust on TV and stand, but overall it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Best one by far!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best air purifier I have ever had.. I am amazed at the quality of air in my home now and love that it covers so much square footage..i intend to buy another for another room in my house..we live in a rural area with gravel roads and the amount of dust here when cars go by makes its way inside like crazy..there was a difference on day one..i highly recommend this to anyone who is researching a good air purifier..
customer_reviews.author: christina carter

customer_reviews.title: where to buy replacement filters
customer_reviews.text: seems good only had it a short time. my only complanit is I can't find replacement filters
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Filter lasts 1 year and quiet in sleep mode.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed change in air quality immediately on first night’s use. Size of ProBreeze was perfect for my Large master bedroom! Very pleased. Highly recommend. Price was great compared to more expensive units that did not cover as large an area.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Solved my sinus problem. I stopped coughing at night. Very light and I can keep it running 24 hours/ has silent night setting. Thank you. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alla Bairamukova

customer_reviews.title: Great air quality improvement for allergy sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: My family had noticed the the difference within a few hours. We've been running ours in the living room constantly. Only modulating the speeds based on time of day and need. It's pretty quiet and unobtrusive. We don't have an animal yet to test the pet dander filtration, nor had I had to clean/replace the filter yet. I'll try to update this review over time. =)
customer_reviews.author: 🖖

customer_reviews.title: Clean Air
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product, it is very quiet even on high. It has a negative ionizer which is important to us. We are a pet friendly home. We live in Oregon so we do get our fair share of dog hair and dirt when they shake when they come in from the rain. Which is does rain often in Oregon! We have one in our family room and one in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Hoeppner

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well. We can tell there is less dust in the air. We heat our house with a wood stove and we have lots of trouble with smokey air. It's very quiet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine B.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit to have
customer_reviews.text: Great air filter does its job and cleans out alot of pollen and dander. It's easy to assemble and works as stated. Downfall is filters are hard to find. All sold out
customer_reviews.author: Ethan P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It keep pet odors away and it significantly reduces the dust in my home. I have several pets and I would highly recommend to any allergy sufferer and pet owner.
customer_reviews.author: Sher K.

customer_reviews.title: We love them. These are great if you want fresh clean air.
customer_reviews.text: I have no dislikes..I bought 3 of them. 1 in entry room, 1 in living room, and 1 in bedroom. They work great. We are happy with all 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This really does work well. I use it in my bedroom, the dustiest room in my place. The dust is not collecting as thick or quickly as before.
customer_reviews.author: Mick, as in Jagger...

customer_reviews.title: As promised!
customer_reviews.text: Working well in my screened porch that we convert to an enclosed sun room in the fall/winter (pull down vinyl windows). It got rid of the "earthy" smell quickly and the air seems fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok- not great.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big fan of this purifier because it’s loud and the buttons create a lot of light when we run it at night. I also put it near a wall and it created a dark smudge on the wall and the unit itself has a black film all over it- this totally grossed me out as I assume it has to do with poor air quality but I hate that the unit and wall look dirty. I would’ve returned it if I wasn’t too busy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Liles

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: Love this air purifier! Awesome price and it brings a filter. I did buy an extra filter just so when I have to replace it oh have it on hand. Perfect for pet owners !
customer_reviews.author: Liz Santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to make the air a lot cleaner than smaller units. Our air quality monitor says the air is fresher after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great air cleaner and purifier
customer_reviews.text: Moved from a house that had mold, and have low immune system due to lyme, Need to keep air very clean for health reasons. Love this unit!
customer_reviews.author: j w

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product , easy to use . Like the soft noise it creates when on highest setting . I used to wake up a bit clogged up as I have carpet and a dog . Ever since I got this air purifier i haven’t woken up that way at all!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s quiet and works wonderfully. I’ve noticed a Hugh difference in air quality, dust reduction, and it removes odors wonderfully. Definitely helps my severe allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbell

customer_reviews.title: Enter your room, feeling fresh!!
customer_reviews.text: Pro breeze 5 in 1 is very easy to use. For people who like a slight a background fan noise, it is perfect. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam  A

customer_reviews.title: arrived  ok but problems as unit is used
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived ok However a sticker on unit said to remove plastic on filter before use there was NO bag covering the filter AND black hair on filter ALSO NO instructions no paper work of any kind S
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Noise is manageable during daytime. Love the ion setting it’s a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Michï

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Will buy a couple more in the future for other bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Lala R.

customer_reviews.title: Clean fresh air
customer_reviews.text: The Pro-Breeze is used in our bedroom and the air seems so much fresher. I will definitely be moving it around the house. My wife likes to leave the windows open and I can tell a difference in the air quality.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ingall

customer_reviews.title: Clean air in my holuse
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my two Pro Breeze Air purifier. I have Allergies and my health has improved very much.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for me and the cat
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a life saver for me and my cat. I was directed to get rid of her because of my allergies. And she will not go to anyone else. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Strange

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Person below my apartment smokes like a train. The hallway smells so awful. I put a under the door guard in and bought this air purifier, I don't smell smoke in my apartment anymore. I checked the filter and it is doing it's job. I run it on high at night and low in the day, it acts as white noise for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Powerful, quiet, and stylish that doesn’t bother our interior decor. The price for the filter is reasonable so I can keep maintaining.
customer_reviews.author: Hanako

customer_reviews.title: Makes the air completely fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE! The air purifier. I bought it for my small salon. I can breathe so much better. Wonderful! Thank you for making such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lins

customer_reviews.title: ProBreeze is in the building!
customer_reviews.text: After only one day of use, I felt clearly better the moment I got out of bed! Everything about this purchase was as advertised And I immediately recommended my purifier to my closest friends. It is very efficient, effective and I highly recommend it to any skeptics out there. Thank you Joshua...I love it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking purifier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking purifier. I've had it running in my bedroom through allergy season and it makes a huge difference. So I bought a second one and it sits very inconspicuously in the corner of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Made a difference in 30 min of fresh cleaner air in the house
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and is quiet
customer_reviews.text: We got this due to the west coast fires. It really helped keep with the smoke levels in our living room. If you need a quiet air purifier this one works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to find replacement filters
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the product definitely works and there is improvement in air quality. I would have given 5 star but it is impossible to order the filter replacement. I have been trying to get one but it is always out of stock. I almost regret buying the product if I can't get a replacement. May have to get another purifier soon.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for several months now and am very pleased. My coughing from allergies has definitely been reduced. Not sure if the ionization feature is working or not; I don't notice any difference in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment you can make.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the fact that it is very light and quiet. I have COPD and have looked at alot of purifiers. A friend of mine had me try her purifer and i was so glad she did. I ordered mine the next day. it was only a few days later that it arrived and have been using it ever since
customer_reviews.author: Judy M Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: 3 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I bought this purifier. It’s light weight, the filter is easy to remove and install. I will be able to actually find and replace the filter when I need. My allergies have gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love my Air Purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I love my air purifier and thinking about purchasing 2 more. One for upstairs and one in the living area. I currently use the one I have now in my bedroom. I sleep very well and feel so much better. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Fresh air even with two Dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this a month and it’s works great!!! I used to smell “musty” when I entered my home due to 2 German Shepherds. I just smell “fresh” when I enter my home now 🤗.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bradeen

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I got this about 2 weeks ago for my parents, and I will say I notice a difference in the air. Cleaner...
customer_reviews.author: Samia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We love our airpurifyer! I m highly allergic to pollen and dust, and what a difference it makes! I m superhappy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heni

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS I GIVE TEN STARS
customer_reviews.text: ALL I CAN SAY LOVE LOVE LIVE IT I RECOMMEND ANYONE TO GET THIS I NOTICED A HUDGE DIFFERENCE WHEN I GOT IT THE AIR FRESHER I CAN BREATHE BETTER ITS HELP MY SINUSES ALLERGIES I JUST ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT I BUY IT AGAIN IF I HAVE TO
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dooris

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great for the money! I am happy with my purchase, it would be better with a scent diffuser built in. Overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla walls

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lysol
customer_reviews.text: Being that it's hard to find Lysol . I thought hmmm why not an air purifier? This one captures the price and quality without the residuals of a spray. I like the fact that the filter has a long life expectancy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Best air purifier ever!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life shaver. I have two mini australian shepherds and they shed like crazy and I am allergic to dog hair. With Pro Breeze I am able to breath again and my house is finally livable again. These are great products.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the sleep timer. I run it all day with the Coronavirus going on. In all fairness, I was going to buy a purifier last summer for allergies and did not buy it. Very easy to use. I keep it in the tv room
customer_reviews.author: korry dessart

product_meta.title: Pro Breeze 5-in-1 Air Purifier with True HEPA Filter, Carbon Filter and Negative Ion Generator - 500 Sq Ft Air Purifier for Large Rooms (Homes & Office) for Allergies, Smoke, Mold, Dust, Odor, Pets
feature_bullets: 5-IN-1 AIR PURIFICATION: Captures up to 99.97% of airborne particles, dust, pollen, smoke, odor, mold spores and pet dander as small as 0. 3 microns. Features an advanced multi-stage filter including a Pre-Filter, True HEPA Filter, Cold Catalyst and Activate Carbon Filters.

FAST & POWERFUL: Powerful enough to be used in small, medium and large rooms up to 500sq/ft (45 m²) with an incredible Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) of 218m³/hr built into a small and minimal design that looks great in any home or office.

NEGATIVE ION GENERATOR - With the flick of a switch, the ultra-powerful negative ion generator binds to and neutralises airborne pollutants for a cleaner environment. It is independently controlled and can be turned on and off as desired.

SMART TIMERS & SLEEP MODE: Auto-on and Auto-off timers enable the air purifier to automatically switch-on or off after 1, 2, or 4 hours and a convenient night time mode ensures peaceful, undisturbed sleep throughout the night.

MULTIPLE USES: Perfect for allergy sufferers, pet owners, smokers, children, babies or anybody looking to improve air quality, remove unwanted smells and prevent harmful pollutants in their home or working space. The easy to change Replacement Filter Model number is (PB-P01F). CARB CERTIFIED: California Air Registration Board certified for sale in California.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars395 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
